Package com.github.sanity4j.report

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CategoryWriter
    CategoryWriter writes diagnostics by category.
    ChartFactory
    ChartFactory - factory for creating charts.
    CrossProjectChartCreator
    CrossProjectChartCreator - a command-line utility for creating cross-project comparison charts.
    ExportWriter
    ExportWriter writes an export of the entire run to a single XML file.
    ExtractStaticContent
    ExtractStaticContent - extracts static content for the report.
    JavaSourceWriter
    JavaSourceWriter writes out java source.
    PackageWriter
    PackageWriter writes diagnostics by package.
    ReportUtil
    General utility methods used by the report classes.
    ReportWriter
    ReportWriter - utility class to write the combined report.
    RuleCatalogueWriter
    RuleCatalogueWriter writes the rule catalogue.
